quiz.question: Which of the following is not a type of connective tissue?
What is the main function of connective tissue?
options: To contract and move the body

quiz.question: Which of the following is not a type of fiber found in connective tissue?
What is the function of collagen fibers?
options: To allow for quick communication between cells

quiz.question: Which of the following is an example of loose connective tissue?
What is the function of adipose tissue?

options: To allow for quick communication between cells

options: To contract and move the body

quiz.question: What is the function of reticular fibers?
options: To allow for quick communication between cells
To provide a framework for organs and tissues
quiz.answer: To provide a framework for organs and tissues

quiz.question: Which of the following is a function of connective tissue proper?

options: To allow for quick communication between cells
To fill the spaces between fibers and cells
quiz.answer: To fill the spaces between fibers and cells

quiz.question: Which of the following is an example of specialized connective tissue?
What is the function of bone?

To support and protect the body
quiz.answer: To support and protect the body

What is the function of osteoclasts?
options: To break down old bone tissue
quiz.answer: To break down old bone tissue

options: It is made up of collagen fibers
It forms the framework of organs
quiz.answer: It is made up of collagen fibers

options: To allow for quick communication between cells
To provide a smooth surface for joint movement
quiz.answer: To provide a smooth surface for joint movement

options: To contract and move the body

options: To support and protect the body
To produce and store blood cells

options: To break down old bone tissue

quiz.question: Which of the following is a function of dense regular connective tissue?
options: To absorb shock and reduce friction

quiz.answer: To connect bone to bone or muscle to bone
